rules_text:
{W}{U} ROBOTS The way of all flesh is defeat. Beep Boop.
{U}{B} MINDMELD Tap your creatures with the power of your mind hammer.
{B}{R} MINDMELD Attack alone, heedless of the danger.
{R}{G} REFINE Push forward aggressively through sacrifice.
{G}{W} COUNTERS +1/+1 counters are vital throughout the galaxy.
{W}{B} REFINE Play the long game, sacrifice early and win late.
{B}{G} GRIND In space, the graveyard is only a temporary respite.
{G}{U} SABOTEUR Combat damage triggers are great, and so is combat damage.
{U}{R} INTERSTELLAR Cast spells from beyond the dark side of the moon.
{R}{W} INTERSTELLAR Your warpjumping creatures are your path to success.
